item.title: Call to Arms - Gates of Hell: Finest Hour
item.description:
Title: Call to Arms - Gates of Hell: Finest Hour
Genre: Action , Simulation , Strategy
Developer: Barbedwire Studios , Digitalmindsoft
Publisher: Digitalmindsoft
Release Date: Dec 2, 2025




About This Content

From the early war “Blitzkrieg” in France to the final fights in Germany, this DLC offers the Commonwealth faction on the Western front. Re- live the British Empire’s Finest Hour in spectacular historical detail, in both multiplayer and singleplayer!
It features English, Scottish, Canadian and Polish forces, all with their own specific uniforms, equipment, voice acting and special perks.
A massive amount of multiplayer and singleplayer content makes this our largest DLC to date.

Singleplayer

Two singleplayer campaigns are included, each with a new level of cinematics, gameplay and detail.

The Commonwealth campaign consists of 7 scripted missions and 3 skirmishes, portraying the British Expeditionary Force in the first desperate days of “Fall Gelb” in the West, followed by the action on D-Day capturing Pegasus bridge and the offensive action around Caen. This is followed by action - packed missions for Operation Market Garden and the paradrops in Germany - you will be there from the first to the last day of the war on the Western front!



The German campaign consists of 5 scripted missions and 1 skirmish. This campaign depicts what would later be called “Blitzkrieg”; starting with the first chaotic but victorious days in France, fighting and surrounding the French and British armies as Rommel’s 7th Panzer (“ghost”) division, followed by missions later in the war defending the Atlantikwall and several counterattacks in Normandy and during Operation Market Garden. The grim struggle for control of the Scheldt estuary rounds out the war in the German campaign.

Multiplayer

“Finest Hour” also introduces the Commonwealth in early, mid and late war periods, with 4 doctrines for each period and 20 brand new Western front MP maps, plus all of the new weapons, vehicles and tanks.

Conquest

For conquest, 25 Western front maps are included. These use a new and unique set of assets, created to give you a good impression of the battlefields in the Netherlands, Flanders, Northern France and elsewhere.
The German conquest arsenal has been expanded for this DLC as well, to complement the equipment you would expect to find on any early war battlefield where these nations went head to head.

Visuals

Finest Hour introduces a completely new set of visuals with hundreds of highly detailed environment models; we’ve even added bagpipes!
There is added glossiness to the textures for higher fidelity, and we've manufactured over a thousand environmental assets, reinforcing the feel of authenticity for the locations and countries you fight in.

Content of the DLC

This DLC is our largest to date and contains the following:
  • Large asset collections for the Netherlands and Flanders with over 1000 assets in total.
  • 170 new vehicles for the Commonwealth and Germany
  • Over 500 human models and over 100 equipment items for the Commonwealth
  • The Commonwealth faction for conquest and multiplayer in early, mid and late war
  • A singleplayer campaign for the Commonwealth featuring 7 storyline missions and 3 skirmishes
  • A singleplayer campaign for Germany featuring 5 storyline missions and 1 skirmish
  • 20 new multiplayer maps
  • 25 new conquest maps






Mature Content Description

The developers describe the content like this:

Historical WWII depiction. Players will be exposed to mature and sensitive content. No body mutilation, or excessive use of gore.



System Requirements

Windows

* Starting January 1st, 2024, the Steam Client will only support Windows 10 and later versions.
    Minimum:
    • OS *: 64bit - Windows 7, 8, 10, 11
    • Memory: 16 GB RAM
    • Graphics: GTX 1070 / RX 5600
    • DirectX: Version 11
    • Storage: 80 GB available space
    • Sound Card: DirectX 11 compatible
    • Additional Notes: SSD drive and fast internet connection needed for optimal gameplay
    Recommended:
    • OS: 64bit - Windows 10
    • Processor: AMD Ryzen 7 3700X
    • Memory: 32 GB RAM
    • Graphics: RTX 2070 / RX 6600
    • DirectX: Version 12
    • Network: Broadband Internet connection
    • Storage: 80 GB available space
    • Sound Card: DirectX 12 compatible
    • Additional Notes: SSD drive and fast internet connection needed for optimal gameplay

item.title: Destiny 2: Renegades
item.description:
Title: Destiny 2: Renegades
Genre: Action , Adventure , Free To Play
Developer: Bungie
Publisher: Bungie
Franchise: Destiny
Release Date: Dec 2, 2025




About This Content

Purchase Destiny 2: Renegades and prepare to infiltrate Sol’s warring criminal underworld in a new adventure where the rewards are high and the line between Guardian and renegade blurs. Purchase now and receive:

-Exotic Ship
-Legendary Emblem

Rule the Frontier

The Lawless Frontier calls — an uncharted expanse where power alone isn’t enough. Every choice carries risk, and every alliance comes at a price. Navigate a world of shadows and syndicates, shape your legend through influence, and become the force that tips the balance.

New Story Missions

Step into the next chapter of the Fate Saga as a new threat rises across Sol. The Drifter pursues a cryptic warning from the Nine about the Barant Imperium’s deadly new superweapon, the Nightfall Station. Forge uneasy alliances with rival Syndicates and take on dangerous jobs that pull you deeper into a hidden world of shifting loyalties and escalating conflict.

The Lawless Frontier

At the heart of Renegades is the Lawless Frontier, where the crime Syndicates of Tharsis battle for control across contested territory. Fireteams take on high-risk assignments using powerful abilities to rain down airstrikes, deploy turrets, call in the Imperium Behemoth, and other game changing combat abilities to turn the tide.

New Dungeon

Join forces with Aunor Mahal in a new three-player dungeon to hunt down the acolytes of Dredgen Bael and face deadly defenses in an off-planet dungeon that will challenge even veteran fireteams. Complete the pursuit and forge your own Praxic Blade, a powerful weapon infused by both Light and Dark.
Descrierea conținutului pentru adulți indisponibilă.

System Requirements

Windows

    Minimum:
    • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
    • OS: Windows® 10 64-bit (latest Service Pack)
    • Processor: Intel® Core™ i3 3250 3.5 GHz or Intel Pentium G4560 3.5 GHz / AMD FX-4350 4.2 GHz
    • Memory: 6 GB RAM
    • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 660 2GB or GTX 1050 2GB / AMD Radeon HD 7850 2GB
    • Network: Broadband Internet connection
    • Storage: 105 GB available space
    • Additional Notes: Beginning on June 4, 2024, Destiny 2 is ending support for Windows 7, Windows 8, and Windows 8.1 operating systems.
    Recommended:
    • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
    • OS: Windows® 10 64-bit (latest Service Pack)
    • Processor: Processor Intel® Core™ i5 2400 3.4 GHz or i5 7400 3.5 GHz / AMD Ryzen R5 1600X 3.6 GHz
    • Memory: 8 GB RAM
    • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 970 4GB or GTX 1060 6GB / AMD R9 390 8GB Memory 8 GB RAM
    • Network: Broadband Internet connection
    • Storage: 105 GB available space
    • Additional Notes: Beginning on June 4, 2024, Destiny 2 is ending support for Windows 7, Windows 8, and Windows 8.1 operating systems.

item.title: Destiny 2: Lawless Silver Bundle
item.description:
Title: Destiny 2: Lawless Silver Bundle
Genre: Action , Adventure , Free To Play
Developer: Bungie
Publisher: Bungie
Franchise: Destiny
Release Date: Dec 2, 2025




About This Content

Purchase the Destiny 2: Lawless Silver Bundle and receive the Classy Tag Legendary emote along with 1,700 Silver (1,000 + 700 bonus Silver) which you can use to purchase the Lawless Rewards Pass, cosmetics, and more!

Visit the Eververse store in-game to use your Silver and buy the Destiny 2: Lawless Rewards Passs.

To claim your new emote, visit the Special Deliveries Terminal in the Tower.

One-time purchase only available during Destiny 2: Lawless. Silver is an in-game currency used at the Eververse store.

Destiny 2: Lawless not included with purchase.

    Recommended:

    • OS: Windows® 10 64-bit (latest Service Pack)
    • Processor: Processor Intel® Core™ i5 2400 3.4 GHz or i5 7400 3.5 GHz / AMD Ryzen R5 1600X 3.6 GHz
    • Memory: 8 GB RAM
    • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 970 4GB or GTX 1060 6GB / AMD R9 390 8GB Memory 8 GB RAM

item.title: Across the Obelisk: Necropolis Of The Damned
item.description:
Title: Across the Obelisk: Necropolis Of The Damned
Genre: Adventure , Indie , RPG , Strategy
Developer: Frag
Publisher: Paradox Arc , Paradox Interactive
Franchise: Paradox Interactive
Release Date: Dec 2, 2025




About This Content

Cross the threshold into the Necropolis of the Damned , a haunting alternate path through Act 4, and a new ending to your adventure in Across the Obelisk.

When a second portal appears at the end of Act 3, you’ll be given a choice to embrace the shadows and descend into a cursed kingdom lost to time. Explore new zones, master powerful dual-class heroes, and uncover the grim story behind the Count, the Princess, and the Queen who refused to die.

This expansion introduces a tragic new storyline, unique bosses and enemies, and gameplay mechanics inspired by classic gothic horror.

  • Confront the secrets of the Necropolis — a fallen kingdom now ruled by witches, werebeasts, and vampires.

  • Battle through 45+ new nodes across three distinct maps: the Dusk Lands , Castle Courtyard , and Castle Spire .

  • Choose from two powerful new heroes to join your roster:

    • Velarion , the Blood Mage (Healer x Mage)

    • Nevermoor , the Death Knight (Warrior x Healer)

  • Discover new gameplay systems: the Infuse Aura and Leech Curse , plus new terrain effects like Blood Mist and Infestation .

  • Face inventive boss mechanics, including the shifting Phantom Armor , the lightning-infused Franky , and a final three-part showdown.

  • Collect 20+ new cards, 19 new equipment items, and three thematic pets: Spooky , Lychee , and Batsy .

  • Personalize your builds with new perks and hero dialogue options integrated throughout the world.

Descrierea conținutului pentru adulți indisponibilă.

System Requirements

Windows

    Minimum:
    • OS: Windows 10
    • Processor: 2.0 Ghz
    • Memory: 2 GB RAM
    • Graphics: 1Gb Video Memory, capable of OpenGL 3.0+ support (2.1 with ARB extensions acceptable)
    • Storage: 1 GB available space

MacOS

    Minimum:
    • OS: OSX 10.14+
    • Processor: 2.0 Ghz
    • Memory: 2 GB RAM
    • Graphics: 1Gb Video Memory, capable of OpenGL 3.0+ support (2.1 with ARB extensions acceptable)
    • Storage: 1 GB available space

Linux

    Minimum:
    • OS: Ubuntu 14.04 LTS
    • Processor: 2.0 Ghz
    • Memory: 2 GB RAM
    • Graphics: 1Gb Video Memory, capable of OpenGL 3.0+ support (2.1 with ARB extensions acceptable)
    • Storage: 1 GB available space

item.title: Warhammer 40,000: Darktide - Hive Scum Class
item.description:
Title: Warhammer 40,000: Darktide - Hive Scum Class
Genre: Action , Adventure , RPG
Developer: Fatshark
Publisher: Fatshark
Franchise: Warhammer , Fatshark
Release Date: Dec 2, 2025




About This Content

Become the Worst of the Worst.

The Hive Scum comes screaming from the depths of the hive, sowing destruction and mayhem in their wake. These dangerous cartel fixers represent the criminal powers that some say truly run Tertium.

Cranked for mayhem

The Hive Scum’s access to concoctions of a more dubious origin is shown in their signature customizable Stimm. Pick your own personal chemical mix, balancing bonuses to tear up enemies. Then break out your toxin kit: drench your saw in toxic coatings and control the streets with lingering Chem Bombs that set foes up for the kill.

Frenzied Gameplay & Dual-Wielding

These gunslingers and bladesmiths have a nifty trick up their sleeves. For the first time in Darktide, a class brings true dual‑wield expertise. Twin‑wield pistols to overwhelm enemies with firepower, and dual-wielding shivs to make you an efficient killer when the fighting gets close.

The Hive Scum is an expert in makeshift weaponry: from crude shivs, brutal crowbars to saws for bone‑shredding close work. Spray and pray from afar with your dual autopistols and stub pistols; pour lead, break ranks, don’t stick around.

Claim Tertium on your terms

Unleash your playstyle with the Hive Scum talent tree: become a hyper‑aggressive hybrid fighter; specialize in ranged firepower with explosives and toxins; dart in and bail before the heretics fight back as a glass‑jawed bruiser - or carve your own path anywhere in between.

No matter your approach, you’ll have brutal abilities at your disposal: tear through enemies with your abilities, control the streets by blinding your enemies with Blind Grenades, or drop elites and monsters in a single blast with a devastating missile launcher.

Make them cower

Tell your story through reimagined full‑body tattoos, gritty hairstyles, and the first-ever face paints. Choose from six distinct voice sets across three personalities so your Hive Scum doesn’t just look the part: they own it. Command respect, and make the streets of Atoma remember your name.

Mature Content Description

The developers describe the content like this:

Includes bloody violence and gore.



System Requirements

Windows

    Minimum:
    • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
    • OS: Windows 10 (64 bit) / Windows 11 (64 bit)
    • Processor: Intel i5-6600 (3.30GHz) OR AMD Ryzen 2400G (3.6 GHz)
    • Memory: 8 MB RAM
    • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970 OR AMD Radeon RX 570
    • DirectX: Version 12
    • Network: Broadband Internet connection
    • Storage: 72 MB available space
    Recommended:
    • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
    • OS: Windows 10 (64 bit) / Windows 11 (64 bit)
    • Processor: Intel i7-9700K (3.70GHz) OR AMD Ryzen 5 3600 (4.2GHz)
    • Memory: 16 MB RAM
    • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3060 / RTX 2060 OR AMD Radeon RX 5700 XT
    • DirectX: Version 12
    • Network: Broadband Internet connection
    • Storage: 72 MB available space
